title.rendered: Q&A SESSION Session with Donal Ward McCarthy (311 Realty Group) & Hugo Dos Reis

content.rendered: Donal Ward McCarthy (311 Realty Group) & Hugo Dos Reis discuss the current Canadian real estate market trends, Bank of Canada’s recent rate increase and inflation.
